name: Leopard Print Drop Earrings
description:
Unique leopard print drop earrings. Each earring comprises of an individually handcrafted polymer clay bead accompanied by a glossy black bead.Both are hung on antique gold plated hooks.

The tiny patterns you see on each bead have been made from start to finish by myself in my home studio, making each bead special and unique.

Please note all items are individually handmade therefore there made be very slight differences from the image shown.

All items come with a small note describing how the piece was made making it an extra special touch if you are giving it as a gift

Beads measure between 5-10mm approx.

name: Large Retro Blue Floral Brooch
description:
This beautiful retro blue/brown floral brooch is handcrafted from polymer clay by myself in my home studio.

Each petal is handcrafted using the art of millifiori canework. The tiny patterns you see on each bead has been made from start to finish by myself. Each petal is placed by hand into a flower arrangement. It is set is than attached to an fine antique gold plated chain.

All items are handmade therefore may differ very slightly to the image shown.

All items come with a small note describing how the piece was made making it an extra special touch if you are giving it as a gift.

name: Pink Leopard Print Bracelet
description:
Kitsch pink leopard print stretchy beaded bracelet lovingly created with polymer clay.
 
Each bead is individually handcrafted using the art of millifiori canework. The tiny patterns you see on each bead has been made from start to finish by myself in my home studio making each bead special and unique.They are strung onto clear stretchy elastic thread with transparent pink glass beads.
 
All beads are handcrafted from polymer clay canes made by myself, not bought in from other sources. Therefore each bead is somewhat special and unique.

All bracelets come with a beautiful handmade gift bag. (Fabric may vary.)

Measurement: Length 17.5cm Approx
 
Bead size between 6mm - 8mm Approx

name: Set of 6 Decorative Pearl Wine Glass Charms
description:
These are the perfect accessory to your beautifully laid dinner table.

Wine glass charms to decorate your wine glasses to make them look that little bit more special.These beautiful wine charms are simple to use; just clip the decorative loop around the glass stem and you're ready to go.

The set consists of 6 charms are handmade with imitation pearl beads combined with crystal clear faceted spacer beads on silver wire charm loops.

name: Set of 6 Multi-Colour Glitter & Gold Wine Glass Charms
description:
These are the perfect accessory, from weddings and large celebrations to small dinner parties and get togethers.

Wine glass charms to personalise your wine glasses and help you and your guests keep track of your glasses at busy parties. These colourful glitter wine charms are simple to use; just clip the decorative loop around the glass stem and you're ready to go. Ideal for parties, they stop other people picking your glass up by mistake and they look great as well, which means you can use them just to make your glasses look a bit more special.

6 different charms in each set consisting of handmade glitter polymer clay beads in the following colours: Red, Gold, Green, Blue, Silver, Pink with gold spacer beads.

name: Set of 6 Decorative Gold Wine Glass Charms
description:
These are the perfect accessory to your beautifully laid dinner table. 

Wine glass charms to decorate your wine glasses to make them look that little bit more special.. These beautiful wine charms are simple to use; just clip the decorative loop around the glass stem and you're ready to go. 

The set consists of 6 charms made with handcrafted polymer clay and gold leaf combined with gold coloured spacer beads.

description:

Wine glass charms to personalise your wine glasses and help you and your guests keep track of your glasses at busy parties. These colourful glitter wine charms are simple to use; just clip the decorative loop around the glass stem and you're ready to go. Ideal for parties, they stop other people picking your glass up by mistake and they look great as well, which means you can use them just to make your glasses look a bit more special. 

6 different charms in each set consisting of handmade glitter polymer clay beads in the following colours: Red, Gold, Green, Blue, Silver, Pink

name: Leopard Print Christmas Gift Parcel Tags
description:
These unique leopard print Christmas gift tags are handcrafted. The patterns you see in the small discs are actually created in the clay.
 
Each disc is baked, drilled and strung with twisted paper string onto my own handmade cards ready for you to write your own festive message on.
 
These stylish gift tags make the perfect accessories for your gift wrapping.
 
There are two variations to choose from, please see the images for the correct design number and choose the appropriate option.
 
Tags will come strung on either red or natural twisted string. (Please let me know in a message with your order, if you would prefer one colour in particular.)
 
All items are individually handmade and are therefore subject to slight variations from the photograph shown.
 
Cards are stamped with 'Merry Christmas' on facing side.
 
Cards Measurement: 10.5 x 5cm Approx

name: Handcrafted Christmas Greeting Card
description:

This lilac flower print bracelet is created with polymer clay.Each bead is individually handcrafted using the art of millifiori canework. The tiny patterns you see on each bead has been made from start to finish by myself in my home studio making each bead special and unique.
 
The beads are strung onto clear stretchy elastic thread with beautiful faceted lilac beads.
 
All bracelets come with a beautiful handmade gift bag. (Fabric may vary.)
 
Measurement: Length 18cm Approx
 
Bead size between 7mm - 13mm Approx
 
Payment can be safely made through Paypal. Please see the Poppy Luna shipping section for all postage information

name: Kitsch Pink Leopard Print Bracelet
description:
Kitsch pink leopard print stretchy beaded bracelet lovingly created with polymer clay.
 
Each bead is individually handcrafted using the art of millifiori canework. The tiny patterns you see on each bead has been made from start to finish by myself in my home studio making each bead special and unique.They are strung onto clear stretchy elastic thread with transparent pink glass beads.
 
All beads are handcrafted from polymer clay canes made by myself, not bought in from other sources. Therefore each bead is somewhat special and unique.
 
Measurement: Length 17.5cm Approx
 
Bead size between 6mm - 8mm Approx

name: Shamballa Style Purple Bracelet
description:
This adjustable shamballa style bracelet is very on trend. Wear it alone or grouped together.

Pink, purple turquoise star and flower print plus glitter beaded bracelet lovingly created with polymer clay on dark purple cotton thread. 
 
Each bead is individually handcrafted using the art of millifiori canework making each bead special and unique. They are then baked and finished before being skillfully knotted with the Macrame technique. 

All bracelets come with a beautiful handmade gift bag and a small note describing how the piece was made. This is an extra special touch if you are giving it as a gift. (Fabric may vary.)

Measurement: Length 17.5cm Approx 
(Will adjust to give extra length)

Bead size 8mm Approx

name: Pastel Pink & Yellow Star Print Vintage Style Drop Earrings
description:
Beautiful handcrafted vintage style drop earrings with pastel yellow and pink star print design. Each earring comprises of an individually handcrafted polymer clay bead with a small faux pearl bead. Both are hung on antique gold plated earring hooks.

The tiny patterns you see on each bead have been made from start to finish by myself in my home studio, making each bead special and unique.
 
Please note all items are individually handmade therefore there made be very slight differences from the image shown. 

All items come with a small note describing how the piece was made making it an extra special touch if you are giving it as a gift

 The polymer clay beads measures 10mm diameter approx, and the faux pearl bead 5mm approx.

name: Cute Pink Heart Print Disc Drop Earrings
description:
These cute heart print earrings are lovingly handcrafted with polymer clay.

Each shape is individually handcrafted using the art of millifiori canework. They are then baked and finished before being set upon silver plated or antique gold earring hooks accompanied with pink frosted glass beads. Please select from the options below. 

All beads are handcrafted from polymer clay canes made by myself, not bought in from other sources. Therefore each bead is somewhat special and unique. 

Beads measure between 4-10mm approx.
